items.name: use-callback
items.description: A hook that provides a stable callback reference while always invoking the latest version of the provided function.

items.name: use-click-outside
items.description: A hook to detect clicks outside of a specified element

items.name: use-confetti
items.description: A hook to trigger confetti animation

items.name: use-debounce
items.description: A hook to debounce rapidly changing values

items.name: use-hydrated
items.description: A hook that returns whether the component has hydrated on the client to avoid hydration mismatches.

items.name: use-is-mobile
items.description: A hook that detects whether the current viewport width is below the mobile breakpoint.

items.name: use-media-query
items.description: A hook for responsive breakpoint detection using media queries

items.name: use-mounted
items.description: A hook that returns whether the component is currently mounted, updating on mount and unmount.

items.name: use-optimistic
items.description: A hook that wraps React.useOptimistic to manage optimistic updates for lists, supporting add, update, and delete actions.

items.name: use-query-string
items.description: A hook that helps build updated URL query strings by merging or removing parameters from existing search params.

items.name: utils
items.description: Utility functions including cn for merging Tailwind classes
